name: Shooting Star (itch) (LionEYm)
description:
Can you defend earth from endless incoming asteroids waves? Upgrade your satellites and reach the highest score possible!

Shooting Star is a small pixel art 2D game, where the goal is to survive the longest time possible, and reach the highest score possible.

In Shooting Star you will need to defend earth from endless incoming waves of asteroids using your missile shooting satellites, and upgrade you satellites in order to help you survive.

Can you reach the highest score?
